name: liftover-coordinates
title: Liftover Genomic Coordinates
description: Convert genomic coordinates between hg19 and hg38 genome builds
content:
Overview

This application performs liftover of genomic coordinates between hg19 and hg38 formats using the pyliftover library and UCSC chain files. It provides detailed intermediate steps and results for coordinate conversion.

Features

  • Convert coordinates between hg19 and hg38 genome builds
  • Support for all chromosomes including sex chromosomes
  • Detailed step-by-step conversion process
  • Strand information included in results

Parameters

  • Chromosome: Chromosome number (e.g., '1', 'X')
  • Position: Genomic position
  • Input Format: Input genome build (hg19 or hg38)
  • Output Format: Output genome build (hg19 or hg38)
  • Data Path: Path to liftover chain files
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a text file with the converted coordinates including the original position, lifted position, chromosome, and strand information.
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python "prod_apps/biomni/genetics/liftover_coordinates.py" "${chromosome}" ${position} "${inputFormat}" "${outputFormat}" "${dataPath}" -o "${outputDir}"
